articles.description: BEIJING (AP) — British Prime Minister Keir Starmer has called for a deeper relationship with China during what he called “challenging times for the world.” The U.K. leader told China’s leader Xi Jinping that their countries need to work together on global stability, climate change and other issues.

articles.title: Starmer and Xi call for deeper UK-China ties as Trump shakes up global relations
articles.description: BEIJING (AP) — The leaders of Britain and China called Thursday for a “strategic partnership” to deepen ties between their nations at a time of growing global turbulence as they sought to thaw relations after years of chill. articles.title: Mikal Bridges’s 19-point third quarter leads Knicks past Raptors
articles.description: Mikal Bridges scored 30 points, including 19 in the third quarter, as the New York Knicks rolled past the Toronto Raptors 119-92 on Wednesday. articles.title: Rebecca Leslie scores two late goals to complete Charge comeback in PWHL win over Seattle
articles.description: Ottawa continued its upward swing with a dramatic victory over the Seattle Torrent at TD Place on Wednesday. The win improved the Charge's record to 4-5-0-7 for 22 points, two back of the PWHL's fourth and final playoff spot.

articles.description: B.C. Premier David Eby said that the province has grown by about 300,000 people in a few years, but he believes that immigration numbers have been reduced by Ottawa.

articles.description: A smash-and-grab robbery at a north Edmonton cellphone shop was caught on security cameras, showing a man clearing out a display case in just under four minutes. articles.title: Arrest warrant issued for man suspected in crash which killed Manitoba musician, two others

articles.title: Fraud charges dropped against all 11 Edmonton tow truck operators accused last year
articles.description: Fraud charges against 11 owners of 10 towing companies in Edmonton were dropped about half a year after they were accused of overcharging or defrauding insurance companies.

articles.description: While the Stollery Children's Hospital is well-known for world-class medical care — it's the softer touches that make a big difference in lives of patients and families too.

articles.title: ‘Borderline friendly’: Premiers of Alberta and B.C. meet with Carney, talk pipeline
articles.description: The potential pipeline to the West Coast was one of multiple topics discussed Wednesday by the leaders of B.C., Alberta and Canada in what was described as a “borderline friendly” meeting.
